I don't have personal experience but here are some effective methods to train a maltese to be comfortable with grooming and nail trimming sessions:

1. start slowly: introduce grooming tools to your maltese slowly, without actually using them. let them sniff and get familiar with the tools without any grooming sessions.

2. positive reinforcement: use positive reinforcement, like treats or praise, to reward your maltese for good behavior during grooming sessions. give them rewards when they stay calm and cooperative throughout the process.

3. short sessions: start with short grooming sessions, gradually increasing the duration with each session.

4. regular grooming: establish regular grooming sessions so that your maltese becomes accustomed and comfortable with the process.

5. familiarize them with noise: get your maltese familiar with the sound of grooming equipment like clippers and nail trimmers by letting them hear it as you go about your daily duties before you start the grooming process.

6. petting and comforting: pet and comfort your maltese throughout the grooming process to let them know that they are in safe hands.

7. seek professional help: if your maltese is still struggling to become comfortable with grooming sessions, seek professional help from a groomer or trainer. they will be able to assess and give helpful tips.
